br.com.oaks.ICPBravo.manager
Class KeystoreManager

java.lang.Object
  br.com.oaks.ICPBravo.manager.ICPBravoManager
      br.com.oaks.ICPBravo.manager.KeystoreManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
JKSManager, PKCS11Manager, PKCS11OpenSCManager, PKCS12Manager, TestManager, WindowsMYManager, WindowsRootManager
public abstract class KeystoreManager
extends ICPBravoManager

Esta classe define um repositório utilizando o keystore da sun, ou do provider default da biblioteca.
